item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Okay “grunge”

First off read the rules and learn how to spell.
Second think about your question.
Third. What do you want to find out? Okay you want to know how to make an NPC sell.
— So go back and look around the forum before posting a topic… Ooooh what’s this then? A sticky you say? Yes a sticky.
— Are you so blind as to not see the sticky that says READ BEFORE YOU POST ANYTHING RELATED TO PRIVATE SERVERS OR MOPARSCAPE!!!
— Okay so now you see that , click on it! http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,15761.0.html
— Ooooh what does it say? www.moparisthebest.com/smf ! friggin doodles…

GO TO MOPARSCAPE.ORG FOR YOUR NOOBY FUCKING QUESTIONS YOU RETARD!

Read full topic
